Control.Name: RowDesc
Control.Tooltip: Fade out the nameplate when the unit talks

Control.Name: ConfigSimpleWhenHealthy
Control.Text: Hide main bars if health is full
Control.Tooltip: Hide the main bars if the unit is at full health (This does not affect your target)

Control.Name: ConfigSimpleWhenFullShield
Control.Text: Hide main bars if shield is full
Control.Tooltip: Hide the main bars if the unit is at full shield (This does not affect your target)

Control.Name: ConfigAggroIndication
Control.Tooltip: Change the color of the unit's name when not targeting you

Control.Name: ConfigFadeNonTargeted
Control.Tooltip: Fade non-targted namplates while having a target

Control.Name: ConfigDynamicVPos
Control.Tooltip: Repositions the nameplate if the unit is too large

Control.Name: Name
Control.Tooltip: Maximum distance to show nameplates (Does not affect target nameplate)

Control.Name: Name
Control.Tooltip: Health percentage to indicate low health

Control.Name: Name
Control.Tooltip: Health percentage to indicate low health

Control.Name: ConfigPlayerCombatDetection
Control.Tooltip: If checked, in-combat state detection is based upon player combat state, otherwise a per-unit detection is performed

Control.Name: ConfigAlwaysPvPCombatDetection
Control.Tooltip: In-combat state is always turned on when the player is in a PvP zone (i.e. arenas, BGs and warplots)

Pixie.Text: It is strongly recommended you hit 'Apply and reload UI' to ensure that all changes take effect.
Downloaded a new version and certain textures are missing? Restart the client to properly reload textures.
Want to add/remove certain units? There's an exceptions list in the lua file. Simply add the unit and reload UI.
